price: See how they call you names[3]. Thus they have gone astray and cannot find a way.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [3] Such as a magician, a poet, a liar, a madman, and a bewitched.
